thread.section_title: Endoca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Endoca | www.endoca.com
thread.title: Alina

author: Alina
title: Alina
text:
To say I'm disappointed is not enough.
I've ordered the 10g 20% RAW Hemp Oil which came in a couple of days. After reading all the good reviews I was really excited and couldn't wait to try it. I've opened the package and as instructed I've turned the ring counterclockwise 1 turn pushed the plunger but only air came out, turned the ring another turn and again only air. Third turn and only oil came out, another turn and the paste started coming out.
Don't know if it works as I only took my first dose/gram and don't know if I will find out as there are now only 6g left in the syringe, If I follow the dose recommended in the video that should last me 3 days that is if I don't have anymore surprises.
I don't think I'll be buying it again as it is extremely expensive at nearly Â£180 for a 10g tube that comes half empty.
